entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
